post.description:
Receives data payload, calculates mean and standard deviation, 
and stores it in the database.

Parameters:
    payload (DataPayload): Data received via POST, containing timestamp and data list.
    db (Session): SQLAlchemy session dependency.

Returns:
    dict: A success message with the ID of the stored record.

DataPayload.title: DataPayload
DataPayload.description:
Schema for the payload received in the /data endpoint.

Attributes:
    time_stamp (str): Timestamp of the data submission in ISO 8601 format.
    data (List[float]): List of data values.
